title: Man Accidentally Shoots and Kills Brother
content:
A 16-year old Corpus Christi boy has died after investigators say he was shot in the chest by his brother on the west side of town.
Officers arrived at a home on Reynosa and Tasco last night around 11:30 last night to find the teenager wounded.
Investigators say his 24-year old brother was removing the gun from its holster when it accidentally discharged.
Police add, the older brother kept his gun close while watching the popular show, "Walking Dead."
Charges are pending.
